metadata.title: Wednesday, 14th September, 2022
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) when the Chibolya Mini Hospital and Chifulube Clinic in Luanshya Parliamentary Constituency will become operational; and
(b) what the cause of the delay in operationalising the health facilities is.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs And Internal Security
parts: (a) when the Government will replace the only motor vehicle at Roan Police Station which has been out of service for the past one year; and
(b) what the cause of the delay in replacing the motor vehicle is.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to re-plan Kanyama Township in Lusaka Urban District to provide for proper road network and other social amenities;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) whether there are plans to compensate owners of properties that will be demolished during the re-planning exercise; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) why the construction works on the Chisanga - Tazara road in Lukashya Parliamentary Constituency have stalled;
(b) when the project will resume; and
(c) what the cost of the outstanding works is.
(a) what the contract sum for the construction of the fuel depot by Gulfstream International in Chilanga District is;
(b) what the variance between the Government engineer’s estimated cost and the contract sum is;
(c) how many companies participated in the tender;
(d) what the bidding price by each company was;
(e) how much money had been spent on the project, as of May, 2022; and

(f) when the project is expected to be completed. ORDER OF THE DAY Ms Halwiindi 1. Thanks – His Excellency the President’s Address - Motion (13th September) - Resumption of Debate: ____________________________
